sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('select top 1 etla.starttime,el.source,FileNameZip,FileNameData,el.BusinessObject,CASE WHEN a.Status IS NULL THEN ''SUCCESS'' ELSE ''ERROR'' END NotificationType,a.ErrorMessage,a.FileLine,
CASE WHEN a.Status IS NULL THEN '''' ELSE ''/uem/dev/edgenta/azure/outbound/log/''+replace(el.FileNameZip,''.zip'','''')+''_Error_Log.zip'' END ErrorLocation
 from eventlog el --inner join eventtasklog etl on el.EventID = etl.EventID
 inner join ETLAudit etla on el.EventID = etla.EventID
 OUTER APPLY ( select FileLine,status,ErrorMessage
 from ETLDataAudit etld where el.EventID = etld.EventID and etld.Status = ''Failed'') a
where el.eventid = ''',pipeline().parameters.ParentPipelineID,'''')
